title: View Advanced Details Broken?
body: Is the view advanced details broken for anyone else and if so when will it be fixed? It hasn't been working for weeks now. I really liked seeing the visual pie charts of wards etc after games.

replies.body:
Hey Lalna,

This is a known bug and will be fixed over the next couple patches. Check out this thread for some things they are working on; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select

-DTN
